name: Time's Up! For John and the Robots
name_original: Time's Up! For John and the Robots
description:
A stealth/puzzle game made by John Daniel Cochran and John Ian Thompson for the Spring 2014 CMPS 80k class. I (Dan) have updated it so it's at least slightly playable. This is what it looks like when you've never made a game before. Surprisingly similar to Mike Bithell's Volume in some aspects...

By John Daniel Cochran and John Ian Thompson

Music by Aaron Rascon
